biotools.summary: Collection of Anti-Microbial Peptides is a free online database that is manually curated and currently holds 3782 antimicrobial sequences. These sequences are divided into experimentally validated and predicted datasets based on their reference literature. Information like source organism, activity, reference literature, target and non-target organisms of AMPs are captured in the database. Prediction and sequence analysis tools, including BLAST, are integrated in the database.
